short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block unwanted political content and enjoy a cleaner browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In an era of continuous political discourse and media saturation,Election Protection Chrome extension launches today to offer users a cleaner and more focused online experience. Developed with the modern internet user in mind,  allows individuals to block specific political words and phrases, ensuring a browsing environment free from unwanted political content. Prepopulated with the 200 most common words used, users may add and remove words of their choice by either right click and entering the word directly into the election protection extension.
